title: Valuable competition data made right
use_cases_1_header: Replace daunting human labour with automated service
use_cases_1_body: If you're gathering your competition data manually or your employee is, then you're limited to less than a hundred of valuable data pieces per hour. And that's a waste of your most precious recource.
It's even worse when you do your competition irregularly.
We collect your competitor's data and provide it in the required format on a regular basis automatically, so the information needed is always at hand
use_cases_2_header: Know median competition prices to avoid benefit losses
use_cases_2_body: When you're running a business in a competetive environment, make sure not to sell your product below market average.
Small hotels' owners might like the ability to check the competitors offers to match and gain from this knowledge.
Having competitive prices in this times gives you an advantage.
use_cases_3_header: Track prices for the chosen categories and products to get the best price
use_cases_3_body: Are you buying a car? Are you getting an expensive tech gadget?
You can get the best price and know the price trend to benefit from it
use_cases_4_header: Keep posted on the pages' modifications
use_cases_4_body: Know first hand about the benefits of new promotions, keep track of online contests.
You can get hourly updates on some pages and get notified when new promotions appear
info_slider_1: We collect data of your competition and update it on a regular basis
info_slider_2: The data is packed with easy-to-use excel files (csv - comma separated value)
info_slider_3: We format and process data in the format best suited for you
info_description: We provide a custom data-gathering solution specially for you. The site of your competition is handled personally by one our best data-expersts.
Usually the updates are collected on a weekly basis, but you can choose any time-frame that is best for you.
The collected data is stored in excel files. The format is a simple comma separated value, so it can be used by any computer user.
We can provide you with handy graphics showing data changes. So your business is always up-to-date with ongoing changes on the market and aware of your competition moves.
